field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the header_check rule.

field.label: Expression
field.help: ![CDATA[Set an expression to process like "/^\s*User-Agent/ IGNORE". This must be a valid regexp (POSIX regular expression). Note: No Validation of the regexp takes place. Please test it carefully.]]

field.label: Process filter
field.help: ![CDATA[Set when the header_check should be processed. See the Postfix manual about header_checks(5)]]
